en.header: Complete activation of your FOLIO account
en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your FOLIO account has been activated.

Your username is {{user.username}}.

To complete activation of your account, please use the following link to create a password for your FOLIO account: visit this link

If you do not create a password within 24 hours of the delivery of this email, then contact your FOLIO Administrator to receive a new create password link.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} FOLIO Administration

templates.description: Password is successfully created email template

en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your Folio account has been successfully created. You should now have access to Folio. 

Should you have any questions or you have received this email in error, please contact your Folio Administrator. 

Regards, 

{{institution.name}} Folio Administration

{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your Folio username is {{user.username}}.

Please contact your Folio Administrator if you have any questions.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} Folio Administration

{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your request to reset your password has been received.

To reset your password, please visit this link.

NOTE: If you do not reset your password within {{expirationTime}} {{expirationUnitOfTime}} of the delivery of this email, the link will no longer operate. Please contact your FOLIO system administrator if you are unable to reset your password.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} FOLIO Administration

Dear {{user.personal.firstName}},

This is a confirmation that your password was changed on {{detailedDateTime}}.

Did not change your password? Please contact your FOLIO System Administrator to help secure your account.
	
Regards,

FOLIO Support

en.header: Your Caltech Library account is now blocked
en.body:
Dear {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your library privileges have been suspended, pending the return of these items. Please return them to the Sherman Fairchild Library circulation desk immediately to avoid being billed for the full cost of the items.

It is a violation of the Caltech Honor Code and the library Lending Code to keep library items past their due date. You can find the Lending Code here.

Please contact us right away if you have any questions or concerns, either by phone at (626) 395-3405 or by responding to this email at circ@library.caltech.edu.

Here are the items you have checked out:

{{#loans}}
Title: {{item.title}}
Author: {{item.primaryContributor}}
Call number: {{item.callNumberPrefix}} {{item.callNumber}} {{item.callNumberSuffix}} {{item.enumeration}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Due date: {{loan.dueDate}}
{{/loans}}

Thank you,
Caltech Library
circ@library.caltech.edu
(626) 395-3405

Please renew or return your items. You can renew by responding to this email at circ@library.caltech.edu, by phone at (626) 395-3405, or online by logging in with your access.caltech account to: https://www.library.caltech.edu/libsearch

templates.name: Courtesy Notice

en.body:
Dear {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

The items listed below are extremely overdue, and you have not responded to our earlier messages regarding return or renewal. If they are not returned or renewed, the items will be considered lost and you will be billed for the replacement cost.

Your account will be blocked until the matter is resolved. Please contact Sherman Fairchild Library circulation staff if you have any questions, either by phone at (626) 395-3405 or by responding to this email at circ@library.caltech.edu.

Caltech community members may renew library materials online at https://www.library.caltech.edu/libsearch.

{{#loans}}
Title: {{item.title}}
Author: {{item.primaryContributor}}
Call number: {{item.callNumberPrefix}} {{item.callNumber}} {{item.callNumberSuffix}} {{item.enumeration}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Due date: {{loan.dueDate}}
Renewals remaining: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}}
{{/loans}}

Thank you,
Caltech Library
circ@library.caltech.edu
(626) 395-3405

Dear {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Please be advised that you have received several notices regarding this overdue item. Since you have not responded to our previous requests, you have been billed for the full replacement cost of this item: {{feeCharge.amount}}. You can pay this at the Sherman Fairchild Library circulation desk during library hours.
                
Your account will remain blocked until payment is received.

Please return the items to the library. You can contact Sherman Fairchild Library circulation staff if you have any questions, either by phone at (626) 395-3405 or by responding to this email at circ@library.caltech.edu.

Here are the items you have checked out:

{{#loans}}
Title: {{item.title}}
Author: {{item.primaryContributor}}

{{/loans}}

Thank you,
Caltech Library

(626) 395-3405

templates.description: This notice goes to patrons to tell them to pick up their holds.

en.body:
Dear {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

The following items are now available for pickup at the Sherman Fairchild Library (SFL). They will be held for you for 7 days.

Title: {{item.title}}
Author: {{item.primaryContributor}}
Call number: {{item.callNumberPrefix}} {{item.callNumber}} {{item.callNumberSuffix}} {{item.enumeration}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Hold expiration date: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}

Please come to the window by the west entrance doors of SFL or to the circulation desk during library hours to pick up your materials.

  • You must wear a face covering when you are in the SFL building.
  • Please practice social distancing while on campus and in the library.

If you are unable to wear a face covering due to a medical condition, please contact the circulation desk at circ@library.caltech.edu.

Thank you,
Caltech Library
circ@library.caltech.edu
(626) 395-3405

en.header: Caltech Library overdue notice for course reserve materials
en.body:
Dear {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

The following course reserve items are overdue and must be returned immediately, and you have not responded to our earlier messages regarding their return. If they are not returned, the items will be considered lost and you will be billed for the replacement cost. Please return them to a library staff member or library book drop. Reserve materials are not renewable.

It is a violation of the Caltech Honor Code and the Library Lending Code to keep library items past their due date. You can find the Lending Code here.

Your account is now blocked until the matter is resolved. We will contact the course instructor and your advisor to help with the return of the item to the library.

Please contact Sherman Fairchild Library circulation staff if you have any questions, either by phone at (626) 395-3405 or by responding to this email at circ@library.caltech.edu.

{{#loans}}
Title: {{item.title}}
Author: {{item.primaryContributor}}
Call number: {{item.callNumberPrefix}} {{item.callNumber}} {{item.callNumberSuffix}} {{item.enumeration}}
Item ID: {{item.barcode}}
Due date: {{loan.dueDate}}
{{/loans}}

Thank you,
Caltech Library
circ@library.caltech.edu
(626) 395-3405
